firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of 2 not-in-play characters
name: Urchin

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of players that nominated a player of different alignment.
name: Messenger
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players nominated a player of different alignment.
flavor: Saying nothing is also saying something.

firstNightReminder: If the Physician has not yet used their ability: The Physician either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player is sober and healthy until tomorrow night.
otherNightReminder: If the Physician has not yet used their ability: The Physician either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player is sober and healthy until tomorrow night.
name: Physician
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn they have been chosen and are sober and healthy until tomorrow night.
flavor: Sticks and stones may break my bones (but words will hurt forever).

name: Sherpa
ability: If a good player dies, you might die instead.
flavor: I will show you the way.

otherNightReminder: If the Clerk is marked with the "Executed" reminder, show the character token of the player that nominated them.
name: Clerk
ability: If you die by execution, that night you learn who nominated you.
flavor: There were some discrepancies in the financial statements.

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of true statements.
name: Tribute
ability: On your 1st day, each player may make a public statement. That night, you learn how many were true.
flavor: You'll stand before your own horn of plenty, ready to receive all that is waiting to come to you.

firstNightReminder: Replace the Acolyte's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Is the Acolyte" reminder token (that player is still the good Acolyte). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Acolyte
ability: The Demon has a not-in-play Minion ability.

otherNightReminder: If the Jailbird died today or tonight, you may decide to kill 1 of their living neighbors. If 1 of the Jailbird's living neighbors died today or tonight, you may decide to kill the Jailbird.
name: Jailbird
ability: If either of your living neighbors die, you might die that night. If you die, 1 of your living neighbors might die that night.
flavor: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.

firstNightReminder: Write down a piece of information or advice, wake the Insider and give it to them.
otherNightReminder: Write down a piece of information or advice, wake the Insider and give it to them.
name: Insider
ability: Each night, you receive a piece of information or advice from the storyteller.
flavor: Every man is surrounded by a neighborhood of voluntary spies.

firstNightReminder: The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
name: Vodou
ability: Each night, choose a character: if in play, they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: I say a little prayer for you.

otherNightReminder: The Lobo points to a player. That player dies.
name: Lobo
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
flavor: The greatest trick the devil ever played was convincing the world that he did not exist.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
